channel.title: Need Help With "Owner.... has just logged in."
channel.description:
Hi, i was wondering if anybody has the code that when an admin with rights level 3 logs in says "Owner _____ has just logged in.
Thanks

item.title: Need Help With "Owner.... has just logged in."
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

Sorry, i cant give you a code but it would be something like…

if playerrights = 3 then
sendmessage("Owner yourname has logged in);

THAT CODE WILL NOT WORK… its just an example kind of thingy!

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With "Owner.... has just logged in."
